Scheaffer Okore bụ osote onye isi oche nke Ukweli Party na onye bụbu onye isi mmemme maka itinye aka na Siasa. O nwere nzere bachelọ na International Relations and Diplomacy na Mahadum Nairobi.
Scheaffer bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ na Kenya bụ onye kwuburu okwu gbasara ikpe ziri ezi na ọha mmadụ, ikike ụmụ mmadụ, ịlụ nwanyị, na ime ihe ike dabere na okike..
Africa Youth Awards weere Okore dị ka otu n'ime otu narị ndị ntorobịa a ma ama n'ọhịa iwu.
